EmailTemplate.description: Email notification on completion of a Roll-Up Summary job
EmailTemplate.name: DRE Roll-Up Summary Job Complete
EmailTemplate.subject: Roll-Up Summary job completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Roll-Up Summary job with the following Session ID has finished: {!DRE__DRE_Event_Log__c.DRE__SessionId__c}
You can look up the Session ID in the DRE Event Logs report to access the details of this job.
